## AnimationClip.deleteTrack() method

Remove a specific track from this clip.

Errors if the track does not belong to this clip. Does nothing if not found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteTrack(track: AnimationTrack): this;
```

track


</td><td>

[AnimationTrack](doc/markdown/./scene.animationtrack.md)


</td><td>

The track instance to remove.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

this

This clip (for chaining).
